body:
Hey everyone!
I am excited to announce that we will be making a small update for Avicus' Birthday on Sunday November 2nd, 3PM EST. Please come to have fun and learn about the update first hand. Please join us on TeamSpeak: ts.avicus.net. The person coordinating the event will be none other than our recently promoted Sr Moderator, Glitchy! I personally won't be able to make the event, but I guarantee you will all have fun! Please come on and lets party!
Thanks,
Max
body_tagged:

I am excited to announce that we will be making a small update for Avicus' Birthday on Sunday November 2nd, 3PM EST. Please come to have fun and learn about the update first hand. Please join us on TeamSpeak: ts.avicus.net. The person coordinating the event will be none other than our recently promoted Sr Moderator, Glitchy! I personally won't be able to make the event, but I guarantee you will all have fun! Please come on and lets party!
Thanks,
Max
title: November 2nd Update
